tit.e: Hanmoto Mitodoke (a government officer job in the Edo period)
Hanmoto Mitodoke (a government officer job in the Edo period)
Hanmoto Mitodoke (a government officer job in the Edo period)

sen.j: 判元見届（はんもとみとどけ）とは、江戸時代に武家から末期養子の申請が出された際に江戸幕府から役人が派遣されて行われる確認作業のこと。
sen.e: Hanmoto Mitodoke indicates the checking work that, when a samurai family applied for matsugo-yoshi (adopting a son on the family head's deathbed), was done by a government officer sent by the Edo bakufu.

Hanmoto Mitodoke was a term used to describe the act of confirmation by a government officer that was sent from the Edo bakufu, when a samurai family applied for matsugo-yoshi (adopting a son on the family head's deathbed).
sen.cmt: より自然な文章となるよう、修正致しました。
sen.e: Hanmoto Mitodoke was a term used to describe the act of confirmation by a government officer that was sent from the Edo bakufu, when a samurai family applied for matsugo-yoshi (adopting a son on the family head's deathbed).

sen.j: 申請者である危篤の当主（判元）の生存を見届けるとともに、願書に不審な点が無いかを確認するために行われる。
sen.e: The officer checked whether the family head (Hanmoto) in a critical condition was still alive, and also checked whether no suspicious point was included in the application.
It was performed to confirm whether the family head (Hanmoto) who was in critical condition was still alive, and to check if there were anything questionable about the application.
sen.cmt: より自然な文章となるよう、修正致しました。
sen.e: It was performed to confirm whether the family head (Hanmoto) who was in critical condition was still alive, and to check if there were anything questionable about the application.

sen.j: 末期養子の届出に押判しなければならない当主が既に死亡していて、押印が偽造されている事態を防止するために行われるものである。
sen.e: This check was conducted to prevent the situation that the family head, who had to affix his seal on the application, had already died and the seal on the application had been forged.

It was also performed to prevent cases where the seal on the application for matsugo yoshi had been forged, since the family head who was supposed to affix his seal on the application had already deceased.
sen.cmt: より自然な文章となるよう、修正致しました。
sen.e: It was also performed to prevent cases where the seal on the application for matsugo yoshi had been forged, since the family head who was supposed to affix his seal on the application had already deceased.

sen.j: 大名家の場合には大目付が、旗本・御家人の場合には所属する頭・支配 （不在の場合には目付が代行）が、当主及び養子予定者の親族遠類及び当主の同役などが立ち会った上で確認が行われた。
sen.e: For daimyo families, the check was made by Ometsuke (chief inspector of the Edo shogunate), and for a Hatamoto (a direct retainer of the shogun family) or Gokennin (also a direct retainer of the shogun family but ranked lower than Hatamoto), by the kashira (head) or shihai of his Hatamoto or Gokenin group (when no kashira or shihai was available, the job was done by a Metsuke (inspector of foot soldiers) officer), with the family head as well as a relative of the son to be adopted being attended.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処支配： 正しい読み方、意味ともに確認されておりません。
sen.e: With the presence of the family head, relatives of the son who was to be adopted, and one who was able to function as the family head, Ometsuke (chief inspector of the Edo shogunate) made the confirmation for daimyo families, and for Hatamoto (a direct retainer of the shogun family) or Gokennin (also a direct retainer of the shogun family but ranked lower than Hatamoto), kashira (head) or shihai of the Hatamoto or Gokenin group (when no kashira or shihai was available, it was carried out by Metsuke [inspector of foot soldiers] officer) made the confirmation.
sen.cmt: より自然な文章となるよう、修正致しました。 「及び当主の同役」が訳漏れでしたので、追記致しました。
sen.e: With the presence of the family head, relatives of the son who was to be adopted, and one who was able to function as the family head, Ometsuke (chief inspector of the Edo shogunate) made the confirmation for daimyo families, and for Hatamoto (a direct retainer of the shogun family) or Gokennin (also a direct retainer of the shogun family but ranked lower than Hatamoto), kashira (head) or shihai of the Hatamoto or Gokenin group (when no kashira or shihai was available, it was carried out by Metsuke [inspector of foot soldiers] officer) made the confirmation.

sen.j: それから、旗本・御家人の場合には所属する頭・支配（目付）によって改めて末期養子届が作成されて併せて老中・若年寄に提出された。
sen.e: Then, for a Hatamoto or Gokenin, another matsugo-yoshi application was generated anew by the kashira (head) or shihai of his Hatamoto or Gokenin group, and both applications were submitted to Roju (the second-highest govermental post in the Edo bakufu) and Wakadoshiyori (the managerial post just under Roju).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Afterwards, in the case for a Hatamoto or Gokenin, another matsugo-yoshi application was generated anew by the kashira (head) or shihai of his Hatamoto or Gokenin group, and both applications were submitted to Roju (the second-highest governmental post in the Edo bakufu) and Wakadoshiyori (the managerial post just under Roju).
sen.cmt: 文頭の表現を変え、より自然になるように致しました。
sen.e: Afterwards, in the case for a Hatamoto or Gokenin, another matsugo-yoshi application was generated anew by the kashira (head) or shihai of his Hatamoto or Gokenin group, and both applications were submitted to Roju (the second-highest governmental post in the Edo bakufu) and Wakadoshiyori (the managerial post just under Roju).
